name: Xenotype
description:
Take control of the Xenotype in this horizontally scrolling shoot 'em up adventure and fight back against the alien threat driving them back into the depths of space!

Earth’s defenses are decimated by an ominous alien armada seeking to reclaim technology they lost when a ship crash landed on the planet’s surface decades before. The only defense left against the alien fleet is codenamed Xenotype, a union of that technology found all those years ago and the most advanced scientific breakthroughs humanity has to offer.
